thread.title: No laughter allowed in court, but 'Bundy Court Sketches' provided plenty of laughs after court
thread.title_full: No laughter allowed in court, but 'Bundy Court Sketches' provided plenty of laughs after court

author: Maxine Bernstein | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: No laughter allowed in court, but 'Bundy Court Sketches' provided plenty of laughs after court
text: Scott Klatt, a stand-up comic who dabbled in documentary film-making, turned to courtroom sketches on a lark. "I had no idea what I was doing,'' he said. But he quickly gained a large following and eventually compiled a book of his work. He's working on a second one.
